backup.title: Backup & Recovery

export.fileName: I'm sorry, it seems like there might be a misunderstanding. The text "quiz-backup.json" appears to be the name of a file, specifically a JSON file typically used for storing data in a structured format. If you meant to provide context or content from this file for translation, please share more details or text, and I'll be happy to assist.

network.title: Network
network.desc: Optional: Full-History Horizon for Deep History
network.autoUseFull: Automatically use if necessary (when From-Date is older than server history)
network.historyInfo: The free Horizon servers operated by the Stellar Development Foundation provide only about one year of history. For older data, you either need to operate your own Horizon node or rely on third-party/paid services.
